Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.View.Ball

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.View.Ball.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueBall, OrangeBall, PinkBall, RubberBall
public abstract class Ball extends Object
The Ball class is an abstract class which contains all the relevant information that a ball may need such as speed, shape, location and methods which will make changes to these parameters.
Since:
04-01-2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Michiel Simson van Dijkhuizen

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB)
      Constructs a ball whose starting position is specified by Point2D argument. The horizontal and vertical radius are specified by Int arguments.
      Parameters:
      center - a Point2D which represents position of the ball.
      radiusA - the horizontal radius of the ball.
      radiusB - the vertical radius of the ball.

    • Move

      public void Move()
      Moves the ball around the screen by combining its speed and centre position to produce a new coordinate which is the new position.
